Sentencas: The ultrafast X-ray diffraction simulations exhibit transient changes of Bragg peak positions of the SrCoO2.5 excited by laser.

Sentencas: By studying the 40 nm- and 60 nm-thick samples, we observe a continuous shift of the Bragg peak towards lower angels at first and then a backshift until it reaches a new equilibrium.

Sentencas: In contrast, the 100 nmthick SrCoO2.5 film exhibits a transient splitting of Bragg peak into two distinct parts until the initial peak disappears.
